TextEng: I think we need to part ways.
Leave me. (If the henchman has somewhere else to go.)
Text: 나한테서 떠나. (부하가 갈 곳이 있는 경우)

TextEng: I want to change your tactics.
I don't want to change anything else right now.
Text: 지금은 더 바꾸고 싶은 게 없어.

TextEng: I want you to leave any traps that you see alone.
I want you to disarm any traps that you see.
I want to move faster and not bother with searching or stealth.
Text: 더 빠르게 움직이고 탐색이나 은신은 신경 쓰지 마.

TextEng: I need you to be stealthy right now.
Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 못 열어도 도와주지 마.

TextEng: Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest.
Text: 내가 잠긴 문이나 상자를 못 열면 도와줘.

TextEng: I want to change the distance you stay away from me.
Text: 나와 떨어져 있는 거리를 바꾸고 싶어.

TextEng: Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies.
Defend me and don't attack until I do.
Text: 나를 방어하고 내가 공격할 때까지 공격하지 마.

TextEng: I want to adjust your equipment.
I want you to use your [spell-like ability].
I need you to cast a spell.
Cast it on my animal companion.
Cast it on the other henchman.
What was it you wanted to say earlier?
Let's stop and talk a moment.
What do you think of our current situation?
I wish to discuss your training.
Switch back to the standard level-up scheme.
Continue with what you're doing now.
What do you want to say?
